about_the_game:
Reply All is a 2D Single-player Roguelike deck builder, where email is turn-based combat. You play as an intrepid employee taking on the hordes of middle managers and office suits in your journey to climb the corporate ladder.

In Reply All you use cards from your deck to compose emails and generate combos. Carefully craft your emails by ordering them strategically within the email and create important synergies to maximize the effects. But beware, choose and organize your words carefully as they will set the tone of the email you will send to your opponents.


Climb the corporate ranks by collecting cards and building and improving your deck as progress.

The outlook is grim, but you will journey through the calendar year, quarter after quarter, and, armed only with the tools in your inbox you will send and reply to emails and escalate the threads of destiny to battle the feared CEO and board of directors.

Can you win at the late-stage capitalism game?

Features

  • Deckbuilding: The mechanic you have grown to love comes back with cards that affect the tone of your replies!

  • Compose Slot Synergies: The placement of cards in the compose is important as synergies can create powerful combos. Choose the order carefully and maximize your reply effectiveness.

  • Collect Company Swag: Company swag enhance your character and your cards in your deck, collect as many as you can to improve your run. How many lanyards can you fit in your drawer?

  • Calendar Events: Advance through the corporate calendar year, and select your next move carefully, choose to do some work and reply to emails, gossip by the water cooler, grab a coffee at the cafe or recharge with some well-deserved paid time off. But don't slack off, that deck is not going to build itself.

*Reply All is made possible with the support of Ontario Creates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A single-player roguelike deck builder, where email is turn-based combat. Use your cards to compose emails, create combos, and defeat the hordes of middle managers. Climb the corporate ranks by building your deck and strategically navigating your calendar to uncover the corporate conspiracies.
